Ciao Alberto,

Check out: htt=
p://www.junitfactory.com


It's something we are experimenting with at Agit=
arLabs. It's free and
a lot of the technology behind it was inspired by the=
 research done at
MIT by the people you mention in some of the other links =
(Dr. Mike
Ernst and his students at MIT's CSAIL).  I am very interested in =

ility in mind (manual or automated) and something I am also
